name: VR Shadow platformer
description:
Created for the hungarian One Game A Month challenge under a month.

The theme was: Co-op

Help the shadow character (controlled by one player on the keyboard) to the exit of each level. To help them the other player can manipulate shadows by moving objects around in VR.

Requires Oculus Quest running in Link mode to work (Rift might work as well but was not tested).

If you are interested, but cannot play it yourself here's a full walkthrough of all 5 levels:
